settings.question: How do I place an order?
settings.answer: Log in to your account to access your displaybuilder and pricing. Orders must meet minimum order quantities (MOQs) andcase-pack rules for each product line.

settings.question: Can I reorder products without buying a full display?
settings.answer: Yes. Reorders require a minimum of 3 sleeves of hats or 4 sleeves of beanies. There is no maximum order limit.

settings.question: What if a product does not sell?
settings.answer: Arcadian guarantees all sales. If     a style is not selling, we will replace it with a better-performing one at     no cost.

settings.question: Can multiple users log in for one account?
settings.answer: Yes. Each retail location can have multiple authorized users under the same account.

settings.question: How do I request a credit memo?
settings.answer: Contact your designated Arcadian sales representative for any credit requests
